Package com.csci4448.project.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdminController
    AdminController gets information from the FlightController and CustomerController and uses this information in the AdminView to display.
    CheckoutController
    This class has two methods chooseCard that creates card with an assigned id and searchCard is deployed in the CheckoutView class so the user can choose a card from the available list of cards.
    CustomerController
    This class creates customers, checks if user input matches any customer first name, and calls infoReceived from the View class when user selects 'Customer' from the options.
    FlightController
    This class creates flights, stores them in myFlight list and uses two methods in PathFinder and PathFinderView to access all of the locations and uses myFlight list of flight information to display to the user.
    MementoSaveState
    This class is used to restore the object state from Memento.
    PathFinder
    This class uses the Location class to add a name and id (which is a city and id assigned to each city) to the availableLocation list to use in the FlightView class.
